title: Implement prompt template engine (src/lib/ai/prompts/template-engine.ts)
Implement join organization via invite code flow
description: Create /auth/join/[code] page that allows users to join an organization using an invite code. Organization model already has inviteCode and inviteCodeEnabled fields. Flow: Enter code -> Validate -> Create account or login -> Join org.

title: Enhance shoutout form with specificity prompts
description: Research shows recognition is most impactful when specific. Enhance shoutout form with: 1) Prompt asking what specific action they took, 2) Auto-suggest relevant themes based on keywords, 3) Add optional Impact field explaining how it helped, 4) Display recognition quality metrics.

title: Implement project-based partnership recommendations
description: Move beyond simple opposite-domain matching. Create context-aware suggestions: 'Building a presentation? Partner Communication with Analytical'. Include task templates with recommended strength combinations based on research.

title: Implement team blind spots analysis with hiring suggestions
description: Analyze team composition to identify missing themes/domains. Provide actionable hiring recommendations: 'Your team lacks Strategic Thinking - consider prioritizing candidates with Futuristic or Strategic in their top 5.'

title: Create strengths-based 1:1 meeting templates
description: Generate meeting agenda templates based on participants' strengths. Include conversation starters, development questions, and collaboration opportunities tailored to their specific theme combinations.

title: Add AI database models to Prisma schema (AIConversation, AIMessage, AIPromptTemplate, AIUsageLog)
Create onboarding flow with strengths philosophy introduction
description: First-time users land on dashboard without context. Create a guided onboarding tour explaining: what CliftonStrengths is, how to interpret results, how to use the app features, and the Name-Claim-Aim framework. Use a stepper/wizard component.

title: Implement rate limiter for AI requests (src/lib/ai/rate-limiter.ts)
Build manager dashboard with team health metrics
description: Dashboard for managers showing: team engagement scores, recognition patterns, strength utilization, participation in challenges, mentorship activity, and trend analysis over time.

title: Create AI client configuration (src/lib/ai/client.ts)
Install Vercel AI SDK dependencies (ai, @ai-sdk/openai)
Implement weekly email digest
description: Send weekly email summary: Your strengths in action this week, shoutouts received/given, points earned, badge progress, suggested actions. Requires email service integration (SendGrid/Resend/AWS SES).

title: Create ConfirmDialog component using Radix UI
description: Replace browser confirm() dialogs with modal ConfirmDialog component. Two files currently use browser confirm(): src/app/admin/members/page.tsx:201 and src/app/marketplace/[requestId]/page.tsx:268. Create reusable component in src/components/ui/ConfirmDialog.tsx using @radix-ui/react-dialog.

title: Create 1:1 partnership guide generator
description: Generate personalized partnership guides for any two team members. Include: complementary strengths analysis, potential friction points, communication tips, collaboration strategies. Based on Gallup research on strengths partnerships.

title: Create team context builder (src/lib/ai/context/team-context.ts)
Create user context builder (src/lib/ai/context/user-context.ts)
Integrate with performance review cycles
description: Connect strengths data with performance management: auto-populate review forms with strengths context, suggest goals aligned with top themes, track strength application evidence from shoutouts and collaborations.

title: Surface theme descriptions, blind spots, and action items on profile
description: The database has shortDescription, fullDescription, blindSpots, actionItems, and worksWith for all 34 themes but these aren't displayed to users. Add expandable sections on user profile/strengths pages showing this content for each of their top strengths.

title: Implement token tracker for usage monitoring (src/lib/ai/token-tracker.ts)
Create My Strengths Deep Dive learning section
description: Create dedicated section for users to explore their strengths in depth. Include: theme descriptions, blind spots awareness, personalized action items, 'How to partner with X' guides, and weekly micro-learning nudges. This addresses the Aim phase of strengths development.

title: Build Team Strengths Canvas visualization
description: Teams need to see their collective identity. Create interactive visualization showing: how the team covers all 34 themes, domain balance wheel with insights, team blind spots (themes no one has in top 10), and printable/shareable team poster.

title: Mobile responsiveness audit and fixes
description: Audit all pages for mobile responsiveness. Key areas: dashboard, directory, team analytics charts, shoutouts, marketplace. Ensure touch targets are 44px minimum, tables convert to cards on mobile, navigation works well on small screens.

title: Create main AI service class (src/lib/ai/service.ts)
AI Foundation: Set up Vercel AI SDK and OpenAI integration
Build API for enterprise HR system integration
description: REST API for enterprise integrations: OAuth2 authentication, rate limiting, webhooks for events, bulk import/export, SCIM provisioning support. Enable connections to Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, etc.
